metadata.name: Sirin bird
metadata.description:
The Sirin bird (Siren) is part of Slavic mythology. The proclamation in songs of the coming heavenly goodness is what this fabulous creature does as it descends to earth. But sometimes people, greatly frightened by such revelations, went mad.

Foundation no longer offers unlockable content, but collector will also receive a high reslolution scanned original artwork (9579x14181px 600dpi), sent to you directly. 

Upon request, a collector can try to have an original 40x60cm (15.7x23.6in) painting shipped. Shipping is negotiated and paid for separately.

Format: 4:5 loop animation (2160x2700px), MP4
Motion design: Artyom.Joy
Original artwork: Daria.Sirin
Music: Aeon Tempo
